title: Highest percentage of travel services in service imports
description: In 2023, travel services accounted for 73.6% of Lesotho's service imports, the highest percentage globally.

title: Lowest ICT service exports
description: Lesotho had the lowest ICT service exports in 2023, valued at only $15,183.

title: Fewest threatened fish species
description: As of 2018, Lesotho had only 1 threatened fish species, one of the lowest numbers worldwide.

title: Lowest central government debt as a percentage of GDP
description: In 2020, Lesotho's central government debt was only 2.99% of its GDP, one of the lowest globally.

title: Lowest access to basic handwashing facilities in rural areas
description: In 2022, only 3.55% of Lesotho's rural population had access to basic handwashing facilities, the lowest percentage worldwide.

title: Highest suicide mortality rate
description: Lesotho had the highest suicide mortality rate in 2021, with 28.66 deaths per 100,000 population.

title: Highest mortality rate due to unsafe water and sanitation
description: In 2019, Lesotho had the highest mortality rate attributed to unsafe water and sanitation, with 108.1 deaths per 100,000 population.

title: Highest adult mortality rate for males
description: In 2023, Lesotho had the highest adult male mortality rate, with 470.6 deaths per 1,000 male adults.
